title: Sprout
description: Web app to sign up your house plants! Receive maintenance tips and reminders.

title: COVID-19 Map
description: An interactive map pinning Students Against Corona's international hubs.

title: Bluum
language: Golang, Docker, React Native, Node,js, Redux
description: A mobile app connected to a Debian ThinkBox computer running a Docker container. The computer is connected, through wifi, to a Soil Moisture sensor communicating with the docker MQTT instance.
